      • startAndGetProcess

        public org.kie.api.runtime.process.ProcessInstance startAndGetProcess(String processId)
        Be sure to use this method for processes containing a save point. Otherwise you risk that org.kie.internal.runtime.manager.SessionNotFoundException raises as the method queries for a process instance that could be already finished.
        Parameters:
        processId - process definition ID
        Returns:
        instance of a running process

      • startAndGetProcess

        public org.kie.api.runtime.process.ProcessInstance startAndGetProcess(String processId,
                                                                      Map<String,Object> parameters)
        Be sure to use this method for processes containing a save point. Otherwise you risk that org.kie.internal.runtime.manager.SessionNotFoundException raises as the method queries for a process instance that could be already finished.
        Parameters:
        processId - process definition ID
        parameters - process instance parameters
        Returns:
        instance of a running process
